title: Unnamed Airline Had Narrow 'Miss' With UFO Near New York: Pentagon
content: The incident in New York remains the only case recorded where a "possible flight safety issue" was encountered.
summary: The incident in New York remains the only case recorded where a "possible flight safety issue" was encountered.

title: Who Is Imsha Rehman, Pakistani TikTok Star Caught In Video Leak Scandal

title: British TV Presenter Davina McCall Undergoes Brain Surgery
content: In a video message, McCall described that the tumour's discovery came as a shock to her.

title: Trump Picks 27-Year-Old Campaign Spokesperson As White House Press Secretary
content: Donald Trump, who swept all seven swing states and won a decisive victory against his Democratic rival Kamala Harris, is now on a spree naming his top aides who will chalk out the government strategy for the next four years.
summary: Donald Trump, who swept all seven swing states and won a decisive victory against his Democratic rival Kamala Harris, is now on a spree naming his top aides who will chalk out the government strategy for the next four years.

title: US Returns Over 1,400 Looted Artefacts Worth $10 Million To India
content: As part of an ongoing initiative to repatriate stolen art from countries across South and Southeast Asia, the United States on Wednesday announced that it has returned more than 1,400 looted artefacts worth $10 million to India.
summary: As part of an ongoing initiative to repatriate stolen art from countries across South and Southeast Asia, the United States on Wednesday announced that it has returned more than 1,400 looted artefacts worth $10 million to India.

title: Trump Names Karoline Leavitt, 27, As White House Press Secretary
content: President-elect Donald Trump announced Friday that 27-year-old campaign spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt will serve as his White House press secretary.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump announced Friday that 27-year-old campaign spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt will serve as his White House press secretary.

title: WATCH: Passengers Fly Off Their Seats As Miami-Bound Flight Faces Turbulence
content: The flight had taken off from Stockholm around 12:55 pm local time on Thursday and was due to land in Miami at 5:45 pm when the incident took place.
summary: The flight had taken off from Stockholm around 12:55 pm local time on Thursday and was due to land in Miami at 5:45 pm when the incident took place.

title: With Donald Trump's Return, Will EU Go Easier On Ally Elon Musk?
content: Donald Trump's White House comeback gives his ally Elon Musk a sizeable advantage in a running standoff with EU tech regulators -- who may now think twice before fining his X platform over disinformation concerns.
summary: Donald Trump's White House comeback gives his ally Elon Musk a sizeable advantage in a running standoff with EU tech regulators -- who may now think twice before fining his X platform over disinformation concerns.

title: Palestinians Turn To Local Soda In Boycott Of Israel-Linked Products
content: In a red box factory that stands out among the drab hills of the West Bank, Chat Cola's employees race to quench Palestinians' thirst for local products since the Gaza war erupted last year.
summary: In a red box factory that stands out among the drab hills of the West Bank, Chat Cola's employees race to quench Palestinians' thirst for local products since the Gaza war erupted last year.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Preparing To Launch Tender Offer In December: Report
content: Elon Musk's SpaceX is preparing to launch a tender offer in December to sell existing shares at a price of $135 per share, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people with knowledge of the discussions.
summary: Elon Musk's SpaceX is preparing to launch a tender offer in December to sell existing shares at a price of $135 per share, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people with knowledge of the discussions.

title: As 58-Year-Old Mike Tyson Gets Back In Ring, A Look At What's At Stake
content: Mike Tyson, who terrorised the heavyweight division during an imperious reign in the late 1980s, will face 27-year-old YouTuber-turned-boxer Jake Paul in an officially sanctioned fight at AT&T Stadium, the home of the Dallas Cowboys, in Texas, US.
summary: Mike Tyson, who terrorised the heavyweight division during an imperious reign in the late 1980s, will face 27-year-old YouTuber-turned-boxer Jake Paul in an officially sanctioned fight at AT&T Stadium, the home of the Dallas Cowboys, in Texas, US.

title: Germany's Olaf Scholz Urges Ukraine Talks In 1st Call With Putin Since 2022
content: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Friday urged Russian President Vladimir Putin to engage in peace talks with Ukraine, in the first call between the leaders in almost two years.
summary: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on Friday urged Russian President Vladimir Putin to engage in peace talks with Ukraine, in the first call between the leaders in almost two years.

title: Lawsuit Claiming Elon Musk Rigged Dogecoin Ends
content: A lawsuit accusing Musk of rigging dogecoin is ending. Investors in the cryptocurrency who said theElon Musk and his electric car company Tesla committed fraud and insider trading are withdrawing their appeal from an Aug. 29 dismissal of their case.
summary: A lawsuit accusing Musk of rigging dogecoin is ending. Investors in the cryptocurrency who said theElon Musk and his electric car company Tesla committed fraud and insider trading are withdrawing their appeal from an Aug. 29 dismissal of their case.

title: Prince Harry's Lawsuit Against Murdoch's UK Group Moves Towards Trial
content: Prince Harry is continuing his lawsuit against Rupert Murdoch's News Group Newspapers (NGN) over alleged unlawful activities by journalists and private investigators despite dozens of others settling their cases, his lawyer said on Friday.
summary: Prince Harry is continuing his lawsuit against Rupert Murdoch's News Group Newspapers (NGN) over alleged unlawful activities by journalists and private investigators despite dozens of others settling their cases, his lawyer said on Friday.

title: Musk Expands Lawsuit Against OpenAI, Adding Microsoft And Antitrust Claims
content: Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk expanded his lawsuit against ChatGPT maker OpenAI, adding federal antitrust and other claims and adding OpenAI's largest financial backer Microsoft as a defendant.
summary: Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk expanded his lawsuit against ChatGPT maker OpenAI, adding federal antitrust and other claims and adding OpenAI's largest financial backer Microsoft as a defendant.

title: Video: Khalistan Extremists Target Canadians, Say "Go Back To UK, Europe"
content: A video, purportedly shot by an alleged pro-Khalistan supporter, has gone viral on social media in which a person can be heard calling Canadians "invaders" and asking them to "go back to England and Europe".
summary: A video, purportedly shot by an alleged pro-Khalistan supporter, has gone viral on social media in which a person can be heard calling Canadians "invaders" and asking them to "go back to England and Europe".

title: "It's Got To Stop": Trump Reiterates Vow To Stop Wars In Ukraine, Gaza
content: US President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday promised a "strong military", as he repeated his pledge to end the war between Russia and Ukraine.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday promised a "strong military", as he repeated his pledge to end the war between Russia and Ukraine.

title: Hamas Says "Ready For Ceasefire", Urges Trump To "Pressure" Israel
content: A senior Hamas official on Friday said the group is "ready for a ceasefire" in Gaza, urging US President-elect Donald Trump to "pressure" Israel as it continued to pound the Palestinian territory.
summary: A senior Hamas official on Friday said the group is "ready for a ceasefire" in Gaza, urging US President-elect Donald Trump to "pressure" Israel as it continued to pound the Palestinian territory.

title: Sylvester Stallone Calls Donald Trump "Second George Washington"
content: Sylvester Stallone praised President-elect Donald Trump as the "second George Washington" during a speech at the America First Policy Institute Gala at Mar-a-Lago.

title: Lebanon Rescuer Picks Up "Pieces" Of Father After Israel Strike
content: Suzanne Karkaba and her father Ali were both civil defence rescuers whose job was to save the injured and recover the dead in Lebanon's war.
summary: Suzanne Karkaba and her father Ali were both civil defence rescuers whose job was to save the injured and recover the dead in Lebanon's war.
